STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Elevate Your UI with Easy-to-Use Button Creator
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Create stunning buttons with our user-friendly interface, no coding required.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Tailor every aspect of your buttons, from colors and shapes to animations and effects.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Export your buttons seamlessly for use in websites, apps, and design projects.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create stunning buttons with our user-friendly interface. Choose from a variety of shapes, sizes, and styles to match your project's aesthetic.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Unleash your creativity with our extensive color options. Mix and match to create the perfect button that complements your design.
FEATURE_3_BODY: See your buttons come to life in real-time. Test hover effects, clicks, and animations before finalizing your design.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Ensure your buttons look great on any device. Our app automatically adjusts button sizes for optimal display on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Save time with our seamless export feature. Download your button designs in multiple formats, ready for immediate use in your projects.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Jump-start your button creation with our extensive library of pre-designed templates. Customize them to fit your unique needs.

CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's design the ideal button for your project!

SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_GOOGLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEX: Continue with Google for Quick Button Access
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our button-making app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of buttons can I create with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to create a wide variety of buttons, including physical and digital buttons. You can design custom shapes, sizes, colors, and even add text or images to your buttons.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app suitable for beginners?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! Our app is designed to be user-friendly for both beginners and experienced button makers. We offer tutorials and templates to help you get started quickly.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I order physical buttons through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can! Once you've designed your button, you can place an order directly through the app. We partner with reliable manufacturers to produce and ship your custom buttons.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What file formats are supported for uploading designs?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our app supports a variety of file formats, including PNG, JPG, SVG, and AI. You can easily upload your existing designs or create new ones using our built-in design tools.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a limit to how many buttons I can design?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: There's no limit to your creativity! You can design as many buttons as you like. We offer both free and premium plans to suit your needs, with the premium plan providing additional features and storage.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: ButtonCraft is an innovative app designed to help you create custom buttons for your digital projects. Whether you're a designer, developer, or hobbyist, our app simplifies the process of making attractive and functional buttons.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of buttons can I create with ButtonCraft?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: With ButtonCraft, you can create a wide variety of buttons including flat, 3D, gradient, animated, and icon buttons. Our app supports multiple shapes, sizes, and styles to suit your specific needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do I need coding skills to use ButtonCraft?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Not at all! ButtonCraft is designed with a user-friendly interface that allows anyone to create stunning buttons without any coding knowledge. However, for advanced users, we do offer options to customize CSS and JavaScript.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I export my buttons for use in other projects?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! ButtonCraft allows you to export your created buttons in various formats including PNG, SVG, and HTML/CSS code. This makes it easy to integrate your custom buttons into websites, apps, or design projects.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 ButtonCraft. Crafting perfect buttons for your digital needs.
